home_page.subtitle: Darwinia Network is an open, cross-chain protocol support games for cross-chain interaction in game logic and game assets
home_page.highlight_block_content_1: Darwinia Network is the first game chain of the Polkadot. Thanks to the Polkadot ecosystem, Darwinia Networks can link to a wider range of games and players
home_page.highlight_block_content_2: System token RING of Darwinia Network is used as gas. Users can get KTON by locking RING. KTON can get Darwinia Network revenue share (in the form of RING). User can get some gas for free
home_page.highlight_block_content_3: We designed an Interstellar Asset Coding Standard so that different public-chain and different game assets can be uniquely identified on the Darwinia Network, allowing game assets to be easily cross-chain interaction
home_page.highlight_block_content_4: Darwinia AppChain is a set of blockchain development kits that can meet the needs of application developers for different blockchain customizations
home_page.dev_content: Itering Team is the Dev Team for Darwinia Network

faq_page.title: FAQs
faq_page.faq_1_title: What is the relationship between Darwinia Network and Polkadot?
faq_page.faq_1_content: Darwinia Network is the first game chain on Polkadot. The development of Darwinia network is based on Polkadot and Substrate framework. Later Darwin network will become a parachain of the Polkadot network.
faq_page.faq_2_title: What happens if Edgeware is no longer a parachain?
faq_page.faq_2_content: Even if Darwinia Network is voted off the Polkadot parachain set, it will still work as a "Solo Chain", where it's responsible for its own security.
